organization.fullName: Centre Hospitalier Universitaire de la Réunion

identificationModule.briefTitle: Clinical and Biological Strokes Collection in Reunion Island
identificationModule.officialTitle: Clinical and Biological Strokes Collection in Reunion Island

leadSponsor.name: Centre Hospitalier Universitaire de la Réunion

descriptionModule.briefSummary: Cross-sectional regional multicenter hospital study of all neurological events (stroke, AIT and mimics) for diagnostic and prognostic purposes. Cost of illness study.

armGroups.label: Intervention
armGroups.description: A blood sample (10 ml) will be taken for each patient included in the study

interventions.name: Biological Collection
interventions.description: A blood sample (10 ml) will be taken for each patient included in the study.

primaryOutcomes.description: area under the diagnostic score curve identifying ischemic stroke, stroke hemorrhagic or mimics.

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* affiliated to a social security scheme
* clinical signs suggestive of stroke : hemiparesis or hemiplegia, unilateral sensory disorder, language disorder, balance disorder, dizziness, loss of total or partial bilateral or monocular vision, sudden neurological deficit

Exclusion Criteria:

* current pregnancy
* Recent clinical history of head trauma
* patients aged \< 18 years old
* patient under guardianship or curatorship
* Person deprived of liberty
